on this one, but I used the MC1350 as an IF amplifier, but the instructions=

ms with the antenna so had to go back the acticle.=A0 I can get the station=
s on each end=A0of the AM band, but it kinda drops off in the middle.

=
=A0I'm no engineer, I just go on the web, find the circuits that I need, an=
d either use them as is, or modify them for the boxes.
